title: The last few days having trouble upadating my client.
body: Get gets stuck on 99% and 1 file. I started repair. Will i need to unistall re-install?

replies.body: You may be having a bad or slow connection that's failing to maintain connection to the patching server.  In this case, the update can't complete, or will try to retrace steps that it missed in the process.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and help get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
There was an issue earlier where some players were failing to patch per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Are you still having issues patching?  Let me know!
